text:
Washington River Protection Solutions | Richland, WA | ONSITE

Position: .NET developer

You will be helping to develop a next-generation interactive simulator to project the mission-outcome of a multi-decade, multi-billion-$ environmental cleanup operation. Greenfield project. AI-integration anticipated (Behavior trees, hierarchical FSMs, WWF, etc)

Our stack includes: C#, SQLServer. Front end likely to be WPF or ASP.Net MVC.

Full job info: https://bms.hanford.gov/HRISJP/JobDetail.aspx?BU=TOC&ID=2861...
